game.name: LOCKDOWN Protocol
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A first person social deduction game, combining real time action and communication, playable up to 16 players. While most players will cooperate to complete objectives to ensure victory, a small portion of dissidents will try their best to stop them at all cost, without being caught.
